paper_title: Uncertainty-aware phase prediction of RMPEAs via mixture density networks

claims.claim: The mesh-density plot for the Laves phase shows that no samples produced by the MDN model fall into any mesh cells corresponding to errors above 0.5
instruction: The code loads the trained MDN model, evaluates it on the testing dataset, and generates the corresponding 2D mesh-density plot
Given that the y axis is the error value, check that all mesh cells representing errors greater than 0.5 remain inactive and thus no yellow cells appear in that region
